TEXT.S:
Alex Acker
u siwkay niza Alex Acker (nalecuhan i 1 a bulad 21 a demiad, 1983 a mihcan), Alex Acker, miunduay. mimali i Amilika NBA. 2005 a mihcan mapili' nu Titeluy Huosay putiput.
u ngangan niza u ngangan nu Hulam: · u ngangan nu Amilika: Alex Acker
kakuniza kalunasulitan-sulu u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika ·NBA2005NBA230 Alex Maurice Acker is an American professional basketball player who last played for Pallacanestro Cantù of the Lega Basket Serie A (LBA). He played college basketball for Pepperdine University.
